data.name: img_profile_banned_user
data.value: ..\Resources\img_profile_banned_user.bmp;System.Drawing.Bitmap, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a

data.name: img_profile_default
data.value: ..\Resources\img_profile_default.bmp;System.Drawing.Bitmap, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a

data.name: str_account_permabanned
data.value: Your account has been permanently banned for repeatedly or severely violating our Code of Conduct. The specific reason given was: $1. If you believe that you were banned in error, you can go to http://acadiverse.magizile.xom/account/appeal to appeal this ban.
data.comment: This message is shown if a user tries to log in while they are permanently banned from Acadiverse.

data.name: str_account_tempbanned
data.value: Your account has been banned until $1 for the following reason: $2.
data.comment: This message is shown if a user tries to log in while they are temporairly banned from Acadiverse.

data.name: str_achievement_member_anniversary_description
data.value: Be a member of Acadiverse for $1 years.
data.comment: This is the description of the achievement that is recieved when a user hits the anniversary of the day that they signed up for Acadverse.

data.name: str_achievement_member_anniversary_title
data.value: $1 Anniversary
data.comment: This is title of the achievement that is recieved when a user hits the anniversary of the day that they signed up for Acadiverse.

data.name: str_achievement_perfect_quiz_score_description
data.value: Get a perfect score on a quiz.
data.comment: This is the description of the acheivement that is recieved when a user gets 100% on a quiz.

data.name: str_achievement_perfect_quiz_score_title
data.value: Aced It
data.comment: This is the title of the achievement that is received when a user gets 100% on a quiz.

data.name: str_achievement_top_publisher_description
data.value: Get a submission featured.
data.comment: This is the description of the achievement that is received when a user's submission gets featured.

data.name: str_achievement_top_publisher_title
data.value: Top Publisher
data.comment: This is the title of the acheivement that is received when a user's submission gets featured.

data.name: str_automatic_ban_reason
data.value: You have been automatically banned because you have received your $1 warning.
data.comment: This is the reason given when a user is automatically banned after receiving a warning.

data.name: str_banned_from_chat
data.value: You may not perform this action as you are currently banned from sending chat messages/PMing users who are not moderators. Please contact us if you believe that this is a mistake.
data.comment: This message is shown if a user who is banned from chat tries to send a chat message or tries to send a PM to a user who is not a moderator.

data.name: str_banned_from_publishing
data.value: You may not perform this action as you are currently banned from publshing content to Acadiverse. Please contact us if you believe that this is a mistake.
data.comment: This message is shown if a user who was banned from publishing tries to publish content to Acadiverse.

data.name: str_blank_password
data.value: Please enter your password.
data.comment: This message is shown if the Password field is blank.

data.name: str_blank_username
data.value: Please enter your username.
data.comment: This message is shown if the Username field is blank.

data.name: str_blocked_from_chat
data.value: This action could not be performed because you have been blocked from this chat. Please contact one of the chat moderators if you believe that this is in error.
data.comment: The message that pops up when a user tries to chat in a chat that they are blocked from.

data.name: str_block_user_confirmation
data.value: Are you sure you wish to block this user? They will not be able to send you any PMs or comment on your submissions, and they will also be automatically blocked from any chats that you owm!
data.comment: This is the confirmation message that is shown when blocking a user.

data.name: str_block_user_from_chat_confirmation
data.value: Are you sure you wish to block this user from this chat? They will not be able to send any more chat messages!
data.comment: This is the confirmation message that is shown when blocking the user from sending messages in a chat.

data.name: str_chat_deleted
data.value: This action could not be perfoemed as the chat has been deleted. Chats can be deleted by the owner, or they can be deleted by an Acadiverse moderator or an admin for violating the Terms of Service or Code of Conduct.
data.comment: This message is shwn if a user attempts to open, chat in, or manage a chat that has been deleted.

data.name: str_connection_error
data.value: Failed to connect to the server. Please check your Internet connection. Our servers may also be down; if this is the case, please wait a few minutes and/or try again later.
data.comment: This message is shown if there was a problrm connecting to the Acadiverse Servers.

data.name: str_content_removed_message_contents
data.value: Your content, "$1", was removed from Acadiverse for the following reason: $2.
data.comment: This is the PM that is sent to a user when a moderator removes something that they published.

data.name: str_content_removed_message_subject
data.value: Your content has been removed.
data.comment: This is the subject for the PM that is sent to a user when a moderator removes something that they published.

data.name: str_delete_message_confirmation
data.value: Are you sure you wish to delete this message? This can NOT be undone!
data.comment: This is the confirmation that is shown when deleting a chat message or a PM.

data.name: str_incorrect_password
data.value: Your password is incorrect.
data.comment: This message is shown when the user enters an incorrect password.

data.name: str_incorrect_username
data.value: No account exists with this username.
data.comment: This message is shown when the user enters a nonexistent username or when the user tries to view the profile of ia deleted account.

data.name: str_logout_confirmation
data.value: Are you sure you wish to log out?
data.comment: This message is shown when a user clicks on the Log Out button.

data.name: str_message_deleted_by_moderator
data.value: [message removed by a moderator].
data.comment: This is the placeholder for a chat message that was removed by a moderator.

data.name: str_message_deleted_by_user
data.value: [message removed by user].
data.comment: This is the placeholder for a chat message that was removed by the person who posted it.

data.name: str_notification_achievement_recieved
data.value: Congrats! You have recieved the "$1" achievement and gained $2 Reputation Points and $3 Acadicoins!
data.comment: This notification is shown when a user recieves an achievement.

data.name: str_notification_count
data.value: $1 new notifications.
data.comment: This shows how many new (unread) notifications a user has.

data.name: str_notification_first_submission_upvote
data.value: You have gotten your first upvote on your submission "$1"!
data.comment: This notification is shown when a user's submission is upvoted for the first time.

data.name: str_notification_mentioned_in_chat
data.value: $1 mentioned you in chat.
data.comment: This is the notification that is shown when a user is mentioned ("@username") in chat.

data.name: str_notification_mentioned_in_comments
data.value: $1 mentioned you in the comments for the submission "$2".
data.comment: This is the notification that is shown when a user is mentioned ("@username") in the comments for a submission.

data.name: str_notification_pm
data.value: $1 has sent you a PM.
data.comment: This is the notification that is shown when a user recieves a PM.

data.name: str_notification_submission_comment
data.value: $1 has commented on your submission "$2".
data.comment: This is the notification that is shown when a user gets a comment on something that they published to Acadiverse.

data.name: str_notification_submission_featured
data.value: Congrats! Your submission, "$1", has been featured on the Submissions page!
data.comment: This notification is shown after a user's submission gets featured on the Submissions page.

data.name: str_notification_upvote_milestone
data.value: You have gotten your $1 upvote on your submission "$1"!
data.comment: This is the notification that is shown when a user's submission hits an upvote "milestone" (10, 50, 100, 500, 1,000, 5,000, or 10,000).

data.name: str_not_enough_money
data.value: You cannot afford this item. It costs $1 Acadicoins and you currently have $2.
data.comment: This message is shown when the user tries to purchase something that they do not have enough Acadicoins for (NOTE: The dollar signs are NOT a representation of any money values!).

data.name: str_not_enough_reputation_points
data.value: You need at least $1 Reputation Points to perform this action.
data.comment: This message is shown if a user tries to do something that they do not have enough Reputation Points for.

data.name: str_pm_user_blocked
data.value: You cannot PM this user because they have blocked you.
data.comment: This message is shown when the user tries to PM a user who has blocked them.

data.name: str_pm_user_opted_out
data.value: You cannot PM this user because they have chosen not to receive PMs from users who are not moderators.
data.comment: This message is shown if a user tries to PM another user but that user has chosen not to recieve PMs and the user who tried to PM them is not a moderator.

data.name: str_private_chat_insufficient_permissions
data.value: This action could not be performed because the chat is private and you have not been given the appropriate permissions to access it.
data.comment: This message is shown if a user tries to send a message in a private chat when they do not have permission to access it.

data.name: str_problem_with_credentials
data.value: You have been logged out as there is a problem with your credentials.
data.comment: This message is shown if a user's password is changed while they are logged in.

data.name: str_report_confirmation
data.value: You are about to report $1 for the following reason: $2. Please note that reports are taken very seriously, and that sending false reports may result in a ban. Proceed with reporfting this user?
data.comment: This is the confirmation message for reporting a user.

data.name: str_report_message_contents
data.value: $1 has reported $2 for the following reason: $3. The context of the report (the content that $1 reported $2) for is: $4. Please review this content immediately.
data.comment: This is the PM that is sent to moderators when a user reports another user.

data.name: str_report_message_subject
data.value: $1 has reported $2.
data.comment: This is the subject for the PM that is sent to moderators when a user reports another user.

data.name: str_slur_entered
data.value: This action could not be performed because your message contains a racial slur. You have earned a strike for this action. If you attempt to send such messages $1 more times, you will be banned from chatting/sending PMs.
data.comment: This message is shown if the user tries to use a racial or cultural slur in a PM or a chat message.

data.name: str_submission_slur_entered
data.value: Your submission could not be published because the submission or its metadata (title, description, and/or tags) contains a racial/cultural slur. You have recieved a strike for this action. If you attempt to publish such content $1 more times, you will be banned from publishing anything to Acadiverse.
data.comment: This message is shown if a user tries to publish something with a racial/cultural slur in it or its metadata.

data.name: str_submission_swear_word_entered
data.value: Your submission could not be published because the submission or its metadata (title, description, and/or tags) contains a swear word. You have recieved a strike for this action. If you attempt to publish such content $1 more times, you will be banned from publishing anything to Acadiverse.
data.comment: This message is shown if a user tries to publish something with a swear word in it or its metadata.

data.name: str_swear_word_entered
data.value: This action could not be performed because your message contains bad language or suggestive content. You have earned a strike for this action. If you attempt to send such messages $1 more times, you will be banned from chatting/sending PMs.
data.comment: This message is shown if the user tries to swear in a PM or a chat message.

data.name: str_too_many_chat_strikes
data.value: You have been automatically banned from sending chat/PMs because you have attempted to send a chat message/PM with swear words or racial/cultural slurs in it too many times.
data.comment: This message is shown when a user recieves their third chat strike.

data.name: str_too_many_publishing_strikes
data.value: You have been automatically banned from publishing content to Acadiverse because you have attempted to publish something with a swear word or racial/cultural slur in it or its metadata (title, description, and/or tags) too many times.
data.comment: This message is shown when a user recieves their third publishing strike.

data.name: str_warning_message_contents
data.value: You have recieved a warning for the following reason: $1.
data.comment: This is the PM that is sent to a user when they have recieved a warning from the "Warn User" interface.

data.name: str_warning_message_subject
data.value: You have recieved a warning.
data.comment: This is the subjectfor the PM that is sent to a user when they have recieved a warning from the "Warn User" interface.

data.name: str_wrong_account_type
data.value: This feature is only available to $ accounts.
data.comment: This message is shown if a user tries to do something that requires a different account type (e.g. a student trying to launch Acadiverse Lesson Studio).
